content.description: Perhaps one of the best boulder problems out here. Start matched on the bottom of the slopey left facing rail. The small detached block at the bottom is off. Gain the groove out right and surmount.
content.protection: Pads. Walk off climbers left easy 5th class
content.location: On the hallway side of the grateful fin. See picture for exact line.

content.description: A Sunshine Daydream. Don't be an idiot.
content.location: On the footprint boulder side of the fin, far right side.

content.description: Another great line up the fin. Start on the obvious starting block down low and climb the blank looking face. Top out. Don't grab the giant hollow horn jug at the top.
content.protection: pads, walk off opposite side of the fin lower fifth class
content.location: This problem lies on the south west corner of the block, in the scree filled hallway.

content.description: The line left of Truckin'. Start matched in the jug just down and left of the slopey rail of truckin. Move left then up.
content.protection: Walk off climbers left. Easy 5th class.
content.location: Hallway side, one line left of Truckin'.

content.description: This fin feature has very high rock quality and some great problems.
